Spicemum is a mobile App that connects persons requiring to buy things from a supermarket store, pharmacy store, restaurants, etc.
ALC 4.0 Pluralsight Project "Build An Album Store Product Page With Angular".

This is a very simple practice project that keep record of food recipes. It is an API to CRUD (Create, Read, Update, and Delete) recipes of food. With authentication to the API to protect it, user file handling to allow users to upload images. This project was from the "Go Full-Stack With Node.js, Express, and MongoDB" an Openclassroom course in the DevC Training with Andela Program in 2019.

This is a very simple online store. It is an API to CRUD (Create, Read, Update, and Delete) items for sale. With authentication to the API to protect it, user file handling to allow users to upload images. This practice project was from the "Go Full-Stack With Node.js, Express, and MongoDB" an Openclassroom course in the DevC Training with Andela Program in 2019.
An Estate security management app developed by me and my group members at the HNG Internship 6.0.

This a Budget App created by team Kymopoleia of HNG Internship. The Budget App, "Kymo Budget" is a user friendly App that allows a user enter total amount available, items or category of things the total amount should be used for,sets priority for the category or item, and the app calculates how much each item gets based on assigned priority.

This is the API for the Emed9ja Project. Emed9ja is the project worked on by my group Team-049-Group-A in the #BuildforSDG Challenge.
